title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.20 - Compressed gases referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.20 - Compressed gases referenced to this section

State Regulations
(a) No vehicle shall enter either a tunnel, the George Washington Bridge Lower Level or George Washington Bridge Expressway
if its load includes any flammable compressed gas or non-flammable compressed
gas listed in section
1211.150
and referenced to this
section unless such compressed gas is in a tube or cylinder two inches or less
in outside diameter and four fluid ounces or less in capacity. (b) Empty containers which last contained a
compressed gas referenced to this section are not allowed passage when the
quantity and/or container size limitations exceed those described
above. (c) No empty tank vehicle is
allowed passage if the vehicle is used for the transportation of any compressed
gas referenced to this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
